00054 WitreServer::WitreServer(TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type arg)
00055 :TeleoReactor(arg, false), graph::timelines_listener(arg),
00056  m_server(NULL), m_entry(NULL) {
00057   bool found;
00058   std::string config = m_log->use("witre.xml", found);
00059   if( !found )
00060     throw Error("Unable to locate witre.xml server configuration");
00061   try {
00062     /* old code :
00063      * rapidxml::file<> cfg(config.c_str());
00064      * rapidxml::xml_document<> doc;
00065      * doc.parse<0>(cfg.data());
00066      * rapidxml::xml_node<> *root = doc.first_node(), *child;
00067      *
00068      * if( NULL==root )
00069      * throw Error("Unable to parse xml content of "+config);
00070      *
00071      * child = root->first_node("server");
00072      * if( NULL==child )
00073      * throw TREX::utils::XmlError(*root, "Unable to find \"server\" configuration tag");
00074      *
00075      * std::string arg(child->value(), child->value_size());
00076      */
00077     // new code
00078     boost::property_tree::ptree doc;
00079     read_xml(config, doc, xml::no_comments|xml::trim_whitespace);
00080 
00081     if( doc.empty() )
00082       throw Error("XML document "+config+" is empty");
00083     std::string arg = doc.get<std::string>("config.server");
00084     // end new code
00085 
00086     std::vector<std::string> args;
00087     boost::algorithm::split(args, arg, boost::algorithm::is_space());
00088 
00089     size_t argc = args.size();
00090     char **argv = NULL;
00091     argv = new char*[argc+1];
00092     argv[0] = strdup(config.c_str());
00093 
00094     for(size_t i=0; i<argc; ++i) {
00095       m_log->syslog("witre.server")<<"args["<<i<<"] "<<args[i];
00096       argv[i+1] = strdup(args[i].c_str());
00097       m_log->syslog("witre.server")<<"argv["<<i<<"] "<<argv[i+1];
00098     }
00099 
00100     m_server = new Wt::WServer(config);
00101 
00102     m_server->setServerConfiguration(argc, argv);
00103     if( NULL!=argv )
00104       delete[] argv;
00105 
00106     m_server->addEntryPoint(Wt::Application, boost::bind(createWitre, _1, this));
00107     if( !m_server->start() )
00108       throw Error("Unable to start the server");
00109 
00110   } catch(Wt::WServer::Exception const &e) {
00111     m_log->syslog("witre.server")<<"Server initialization ERROR : "<<e.what();
00112     throw Error(e.what());
00113   }
00114 }
00115 
00116 WitreServer::~WitreServer() {
00117   std::cerr<<"Deleting the server ???"<<std::endl;
00118   try {
00119     // destroy the server
00120     if( NULL!=m_server )
00121       delete m_server;
00122   } catch(Wt::WServer::Exception const &e) {
00123     m_log->syslog("WitreServer")<<"Error during shutdown : "<<e.what();
00124     throw Error(e.what());
00125   }
00126 }

00146 // wt functions

00148 void WitreServer::connect(WitreApplication *client, const boost::function<void()>& function)
00149 {
00150     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00151     connections.push_back(Connection(Wt::WApplication::instance()->sessionId(), client, function));
00152 }
00153 
00154 void WitreServer::disconnect(WitreApplication *client)
00155 {
00156     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00157     for (unsigned i = 0; i < connections.size(); ++i) {
00158       if (connections[i].client == client) {
00159         connections.erase(connections.begin() + i);
00160         return;
00161           }
00162         }
00163 
00164         assert(false);
00165 }
00166 
00167 /*
00168  * by deriving from graph::timelines_listener I can now be informed
00169  * from new timeline created in the agent at any time 
00170  */
00171 void WitreServer::declared(details::timeline const &timeline) {
00172   if( !isExternal(timeline.name()) ) { 
00173     // If I did not onnect to it yet just create the connection
00174     use(timeline.name()); // as we do not have internal timlines this operation will always succeed
00175     {
00176       // then add it to externalTimelines
00177       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00178       externalTimelines.push_back(timeline.name());
00179     }
00180   }
00181 }
00182 
00183 /*
00184  * conversely I am notified from timelines not being owned by any reactor 
00185  * anymore ... but we do not have that much to do here for now 
00186  */
00187 void WitreServer::undeclared(details::timeline const &timeline) {}
00188 
00189 void WitreServer::handleInit() {
00190   graph::timelines_listener::initialize();
00191 }
00192 
00193 void WitreServer::notify(Observation const &obs)
00194 {
00195     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00196     time_t now = std::floor(tickToTime(getCurrentTick()));
00197     std::ostringstream oss;
00198     oss <<"<Token tick=\""<<getCurrentTick()<<"\" on=\""
00199         <<obs.object()<<"\" pred=\""<<obs.predicate()<<"\">"
00200         <<ctime(&now)<<": "<<obs<<"</Token>";
00201     std::ostringstream time;
00202     time << getCurrentTick();
00203     //Storing the observation
00204     Observations* temp = new Observations(oss.str(), obs.object().str(), time.str());
00205     observations.push(*temp);
00206     /* This is where we notify all connected clients. */
00207     for (unsigned i = 0; i < connections.size(); ++i) {
00208         Connection& c = connections[i];
00209         c.client->addObs(temp);
00210         Wt::WServer::instance()->post(c.sessionId, c.function);
00211     }
00212 
00213 }
00214 
00215 bool WitreServer::synchronize()
00216 {
00217     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00218     time_t now = std::floor(tickToTime(getCurrentTick()+1));
00219     //time(&now);
00220     //struct tm* tnow = localtime(&now);
00221     //std::cout<<timeToTick(now)<<std::endl;
00222     std::ostringstream oss;
00223     oss<<"<Tick value=\""<<(getCurrentTick()+1)<<"\">"<<"Tick Value: "<<now<<"</Tick>";
00224     //Storing ticks
00225     Observations* temp = new Observations(oss.str(), "Tick");
00226     observations.push(*temp);
00227     //Notify all connected clients
00228     for (unsigned i = 0; i < connections.size(); ++i) {
00229             Connection& c = connections[i];
00230             c.client->addObs(temp);
00231             Wt::WServer::instance()->post(c.sessionId, c.function );
00232     }
00233 
00234     return true;
00235 }
00236 
00237 goal_id WitreServer::clientGoalPost(Goal const &g)
00238 {
00239     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00240     if(isExternal(g.object()))
00241     {
00242         goal_id id = postGoal(g);
00243         return id;
00244     }
00245     return goal_id();
00246 }
00247 
00248 TREX::transaction::Goal WitreServer::getGoal(std::string obs, std::string prd)
00249 {
00250     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00251     TREX::transaction::Goal clientGoal(obs,prd);
00252     return clientGoal;
00253 }

00256 // Modifiers
00257 
00258 bool WitreServer::attach(WitreReactor &r) {
00259   if( NULL!=m_entry )
00260     m_entry = &r;
00261   return &r==m_entry;
00262 }
00263 
00264 void WitreServer::detach(WitreReactor &r) {
00265   if( &r==m_entry )
00266     m_entry = NULL;
00267 }
